ComicInfo.Series: The Big Book of Little Criminals
ComicInfo.Summary: Reoffered to coincide with the release of THE BIG BOOK OF WILD WOMEN, this BIG BOOK collection offers over 60 tales of real-life convicts, killers, connivers, and con men that have taken their place in criminal history.
ComicInfo.Title: Willie "The Actor" Sutton: That's Where the Money Is; Shanghai Kelly: The Man Who Fed Sailors to the Sea; Ernest Booth; John Ashley: Swamp Bandit; Black Bart the Po8; Mal Henri: The Incredible Survivor; The Savage Caning of Senator Sumner; Frederick Emerson Peters: The Crook Everybody Liked; Robbing Them Blind; George Remus and the Craziest Verdict Ever; George Metesky: The Mad Bomber; Al Capone: The Littlest Criminal in Alcatraz; Cap Streeter; Serge Rubinstein: Society's Golden Bad Boy; Count Victor Lustig; Gaston Means: The Maude King Case; Avanna Sherrill?; Joseph Weil; Jake "The Barber"; "Honest" John Kelly; Henri LeMoine; A Fisch Story; James Reavis: The Man Who Stole Arizona; Vanishing Act: A Tale of Disappearing Ink; Han Van Meegeren; The San Quentin Forgers; Mary Butterworth: The Colonial Counterfeiter; 10,000 Percent Tatum: The Genuine Counterfeiter; Franz Tausend: The Man Who Hustled Hitler; Alves Reis: The Man Who Almost Bought Portugal; Mr. 880: The One-Dollar Counterfeiter; Avenging "Nails" Norton; Mickey Cohen: The Luckiest Mobster; The Richardsons; Locke's Lament; Don Carmelo Fresina and the Pillow Gang; Tubbo Gilbert: The World's Richest Cop; Joe Columbo: Gandhi of the Mafia; Sam Cardinella's Noose Ruse; Frank "Dasher" Abbandando: Murder Inc.'s Fastest Killer; Louie "Pretty" Amberg: New York's Meanest, Ugliest Gangster; "Schemer" Drucci: The Bedbug; The Chicago Black Sox; Willie Moretti: The Wild Joker; Vincente Gigante: The 300-Pound Hitman; "Pittsburgh" Phil Strauss; Armando Illiano: The Littlest Little Criminal; Ma Barker; Countess DiFrasso: The Royal Moll; Belle Gunness: Indiana's Lady Bluebeard; Eleanor Jarman: The Blonde Tigress; Cassie Chadwick: She Stole from Everyone; Kathryn Kelly: The Machine Gun Moll; Sara Ellis: The Eternal Adultress; When Harry Met Leona; The Brink's Job; Britain's Great Train Robbery; A Nice Bank Job; Mona Lisa Mysteries; The Pierre Hotel Heist; The Roundout Heist; The Lufthansa Heist; D.B. Cooper, Airline Hijacker
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Sifakis,George Hagenauer,Tom Peyer,Lou Stathis,Judy Maguire,Joel Rose
